info.title: Presence Sensor

sensor.presence.name: sensor.presence
sensor.presence.description: This Resource describes whether presence has been sensed or not. The Property "value" is a boolean. A value of 'true' means that presence has been sensed. A value of 'false' means that presence not been sensed.

value.description: The presences sensor, true = precense sensed, false = precensenot sensed.
